page.title: 07A Day in Grimsby, Part 1.
page.content: A day in my life would be to get up at {7.00}(my usual time) and get dressed. Almost every day I sit and listen to my mum, dad and family talking ( so for today ). At about{7.20}I have my {breakfast}which consists of three rounds of{toast,}a few{biscuits}and a glass of{milk}or{orange.}I get my school bag ready for school which takes about{10 minutes.}By that time it is{7.40,}and in another{5 minutes}I leave for school. On the way I pass my best friends house but I don't call for her as I have{prefect}duties to do and have to go in school straight away. As I near the gate I always meet with another of my friends and we walk in school together. In school I have a variety of things to do, first I put the chairs down in the{dining {room,}then I set out the school
